Title: A Farewell to Arms?.
Subtitle: Beyond the Good Friday Agreement, Second Edition.

Description: Neither naively optimistic nor hopelessley pessimistic, this collection of writings by experts on the history of the troubles in Northern Ireland paints a realistic picture of the peace processes that have dotted the province's landscape..
